title: Archeology, animal photography, BBQ ...
description: Nathan Myhrvold talks about a few of his latest fascinations -- animal photography, archeology, BBQ and generally being an eccentric genius multimillionaire. Listen for wild stories from the (somewhat raunchy) edge of the animal world.
author: Nathan Myhrvold
keywords: TED, talks, animals, dinosaurs, entertainment, exploration, fish, humor, photography, archaeology
